meanings.definition: A person who owns, operates, or manages a business or property.
meanings.sent1: The propretor of the bakery greeted customers with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: The propretor of the store made sure to keep the shelves stocked.
meanings.sent3: The propretor of the farm tried to milk a cow but ended up with a mess!
meanings.sent4: As the propretor of the hotel, she was the queen of hospitality.
meanings.sent5: The propretor's dedication to the business was truly inspiring.
